about_the_game:
"Every great film should seem new every time you see it."

Relive all of your favorite Re;birth 1 event scenes with the AV Club DLC!
You can now go to the Museum and *rewatch your favorite events over and over again!

*Note: Only event scenes that have been played through already will be available here.
detailed_description:
"Every great film should seem new every time you see it."

Relive all of your favorite Re;birth 1 event scenes with the AV Club DLC!
You can now go to the Museum and *rewatch your favorite events over and over again!

*Note: Only event scenes that have been played through already will be available here.

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1 AV Club - $0.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1 AV Club DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core2Duo 2.66 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 with video card with 1GB ram and support for v4 shaders
  • Storage: 7 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: May not work properly with Windows 7 and 8 (32bit) version. On-board graphics card are not recommend. Highly recommend to have an independent graphics card.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or 8 (64bit) or newer
  • Processor: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 with video card with 1GB ram and support for v4 shaders
  • Storage: 7 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: May not work properly with Windows 7 and 8 (32bit) version

esrb.descriptors:

short_description: With the AV Club DLC, players can revisit their favorite video scenes in Re;Birth1!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
